boone.training

Class RpropTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.Trainer
      • boone.training.BackpropTrainer
        • boone.training.RpropTrainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RpropTrainer
extends BackpropTrainer
    The Resilient Back-propagation trainer. Instead of directly using the gradient information, a specific weight update value is calculated for each weight (and bias) based on the two previous gradients of that weight. Hence, the update values, i.e., weight changes, adapt to the training progress.
    Version:
    $Id: RpropTrainer.java 2291 2015-12-04 17:45:14Z helmut $
    Author:
    August Mayer, Helmut A. Mayer

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double maxUpdateValue
      The maximal update value (default 50.0).
      protected double minUpdateValue
      The minimal update value (default 1.0E-6).
      protected double rateDecFactor
      The negative update value change (default 0.5).
      protected double rateIncFactor
      The positive update value change (default 1.2).
